item.title: This Amazing Trick Will Have You Cooking Perfect Rice on the Stove Every Time!
item.description: Introduction Are you tired of eating overcooked, mushy rice? Do you want to learn how to cook the perfect rice on the stove every time? Well, youâ€™re in luck! This amazing trick will have you cooking perfect rice on the stove every time! Definition of Perfect Rice Perfectly cooked rice is tender, fluffy, and has a pleasant texture. It should not be too dry or too wet, and should have a slight bite to it.
